playground.heading: Playground.
playground.subheading: This page is my playground. Whenever I stumble across particularly _attractive_ UI elements, I endeavour to recreate them. It's a fun personal challenge. Throughout my career I've used all types of CSS flavours and paradigms: vanilla, Less, Sass, SMACCS, and BEM. These days, however, I've fallen in love with [Tailwind](https://tailwindcss.com/).
playground.intro: I'm sharing this with you so that it may not only inspire you to try the same (if you're a developer) but also demonstrate my front-end development capabilities. Like what you see? [Get in touch.](mailto:tristan@pixls.com.au)
playground.repo: Are you interested in seeing the source code? [View this site on GitHub.](https://github.com/r3oath/portfolio)
playground.tooling: My stack of choice is [Tailwind](https://tailwindcss.com/), [React](https://react.dev/), [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/), [Vercel](https://vercel.com/), and [DatoCMS](https://www.datocms.com/)
playground.viewport: **Please view this page on a large viewport.** Due to the size constraints of the example window sandboxes, this page only works well on desktop and large tablet devices.
playground.placeholder: I'm porting over all the UI experiments and examples from various places on the web I've used in the past. Please stay tuned; they'll be here soon.
